::KitKat::
She turned and looked at Destructor. Still trying to catch her 
breath,"Ah..that's ..that's alright. Ah...nothing to forgive. I 
just...wasn't....expecting....that." She coughed and tried to reagian 
her composure. "Ah, yes, well, anyway, ah,." she felt her head spin 
and put her hand on Destructor's shoulder to steady herself. She had 
to change the subject quickly,"What do yuo think of my plan thus far?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  Destructor saw his mistake. It had been the wrong time. "I am 
sorry. I could 
> not hold back my feelings any longer. You must have seen it.. But 
it does not 
> matter. I apolagize. What are your orders?" he tried to hind the 
hurt of her 
> reaction to him. But he was unsure it was working. He knew however 
no matter 
> what he could never leave her side. He went down on all four on the 
ground 
> behind her. "Please forgive my ignorance. " a quick tear fewll down 
his face 
> but it immediatly evaporated.
